## Quick Start

### Generate New Task Cards

```bash
# Matter and Energy (COMPLETE - 24 cards)
python scripts/generators/task_cards_generator.py --topic matter_energy

# Other topics (TEMPLATE - 2 cards each, need expansion)
python scripts/generators/task_cards_generator.py --topic ecosystems
python scripts/generators/task_cards_generator.py --topic forces_motion
python scripts/generators/task_cards_generator.py --topic earth_systems
python scripts/generators/task_cards_generator.py --topic genetics
```

### View Available Topics

```bash
python scripts/generators/task_cards_generator.py --help
```

## What's Included

Each generated PowerPoint contains:
1. **Title slide** - Topic name, grade level, card count
2. **Task card pages** - 6 cards per page (3Ã—2 grid), 2.5" Ã— 3.5" each
3. **Answer key** - Separate pages with all answers
